clock_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin which SCLK is connected to.

*See also: [sm2135 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2135.html#configuration-variables)*

cw_current.docs:
**, current**: The current used for the white channel. Defaults to `10mA`. Can be one of `10mA`, `15mA`, `20mA`, `25mA`, `30mA`, `35mA`, `40mA`, `45mA`, `50mA`, `55mA`, `60mA`.

*See also: [sm2135 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2135.html#configuration-variables)*

data_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin used for MOSI.

*See also: [sm2135 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2135.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this `sm2135` component. Use this if you have multiple SM2135 chains connected at the same time.

*See also: [sm2135 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2135.html#configuration-variables)*

rgb_current.docs:
**, current**: The current used for the RGB channel. Defaults to `20mA`. Can be one of `10mA`, `15mA`, `20mA`, `25mA`, `30mA`, `35mA`, `40mA`, `45mA`.

*See also: [sm2135 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2135.html#configuration-variables)*

separate_modes.docs:
**, bool**: Use separate RGB/CW modes instead of writing all 5 values as RGB. Defaults to `true`, keep it at `true` if your SM2135 chip variant does not support simultaneous CW and RGB modes (e.g. SM2135E). Set this to `false` when your SM2135 chip variant supports having CW and RGB leds on at the same time (e.g. SM2135EH/SM2135EJ).

*See also: [sm2135 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2135.html#configuration-variables)*

channel.docs:
**, int**: Chose the channel of the SM2135 chain of this output component.

*See also: [sm2135 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2135.html#id1)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [sm2135 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2135.html#id1)*

sm2135_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2135.html#sm2135-component). Use this if you have multiple SM2135 chains you want to use at the same time.

*See also: [sm2135 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2135.html#id1)*
